name: IndiaHeadlines
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: india headlines
des:
As part of your Flash Briefing News, hear the latest Headlines in English from India and around the world.
News is curated from feeds from Reuters, Economic Times, Times of India, Business World.

Get latest trending news in Current Affairs, Business, Technology, Entertainment & Sports which 
is updated multiple times during the day.

After you have enabled the "India Headlines" Skill, you can say “Alexa, India Headlines?” or
“Alexa, India Headlines News” to hear the latest news.

Alexa plays Current Affairs news and when it completes then for each News Category { Business, Technology, Sports, Entertainment }
Alexa will prompt saying "e.g Do you want to listen Technology News?"
You can respond by saying :-

"Yes" -> Starts playing news 
"Skip" -> It will take you to next Category News reprompt 
"No" -> The skill will stop similar to Alexa, "Stop".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
